content.html:
@mxgrey this looks great; I just have two small changes in branch issue_2505_scpeters:

  • 32eb131: refactor the for loop slightly to fix a cppcheck complaint about { being at the end of a line and also use IGN_PI instead of M_PI
  • 789f0e7: use Vector3d::Zero and Quaterniond::Identity in a few spots since I find them more readable (optional)
